mutants.code:
def shuffle_array(arr):
    arr.sort()
    result = []
    (i, j) = (0, 1)
    while i <= len(arr):
        result.append(arr[i])
        if j < len(arr):
            result.append(arr[j])
        i += 2
        j += 2
    return result

def shuffle_array(arr):
    arr.sort()
    result = []
    (i, j) = (0, 1)
    while i >= len(arr):
        result.append(arr[i])
        if j < len(arr):
            result.append(arr[j])
        i += 2
        j += 2
    return result

def shuffle_array(arr):
    arr.sort()
    result = []
    (i, j) = (0, 1)

    return result
